Address.label: Address
Address.value: 207 GOODE AVENUE, GLENDALE, California, 91203, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Avery Dennison manufactures pressure-sensitive materials, merchandise tags, and labels. The company also runs a specialty converting business that produces radio-frequency identification inlays and labels. Avery Dennison draws a significant amount of revenue from outside the United States, with international operations accounting for the majority of total sales.

value.name: Nicholas R. Colisto
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
